articles.title: Alex Bregman reportedly still a ‘near certainty’ to opt out of Red Sox contract
articles.description:
Bregman can opt out of the two seasons remaining on his three-year, $120 million deal this offseason.

The post Alex Bregman reportedly still a ‘near certainty’ to opt out of Red Sox contract appeared first on Boston.com.
